name: My Inspiration Lounge
tag_list: travel, finance, green, books, cooking, lifestyle, news, entrepreneurial, music, films, gardening, home, parents, change-the-world, health, education
overview:
My Inspiration Lounge is a new online portal connecting women to the best content on the web.

My Inspiration Lounge is the only content aggregator of its kind to focus on helping women of all ages navigate the best content on the web. Women love efficiency and always short on time, yet searching online can be overwhelming with information overload. My Inspiration Lounge helps women cut through the clutter so they can get informed and inspired immediately.

My Inspiration Lounge provides an alternative to the fashion, celebrity gossip and dieting sites that proliferate the web. Women are seeking content that moves them to live a fuller life, be more engaged and informed.
